items.title: WWDC 2025：macOS 26 Tahoe 预期内容 (原标题: WWDC 2025: What to Expect From macOS 26 Tahoe)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# WWDC 2025：macOS 26 Tahoe 预期内容

在WWDC 2025即将到来之际，本文详细介绍了苹果下一代macOS操作系统——macOS Tahoe的预期内容。

## 命名方式变更

*   **新版本号：** macOS将从macOS 15直接跳到macOS 26，而非macOS 16。
*   **统一命名：** 从今年开始，苹果将改变操作系统的命名方案。所有在2025年推出的操作系统更新，包括iOS 26、iPadOS 26、tvOS 26、watchOS 26和visionOS 26，都将统一使用“26”作为版本号，以反映其发布季节（涵盖2025年9月至2026年9月）。
*   **原因：** 这种简化命名旨在避免不同操作系统版本号的混淆，并更准确地反映其在2026年更长时间内的安装使用。
*   **macOS专属地标名：** macOS将继续沿用加州地标命名，此次选择“Tahoe”（太浩湖），一个位于加州和内华达州之间的著名湖泊和度假胜地。

## 设计大修

macOS 26将获得与iOS 26类似的重大设计更新，旨在实现苹果操作系统之间更强的视觉统一性。

*   **设计灵感：** 新设计将借鉴visionOS的界面元素，重点在于：
    *   **半透明效果：** 扩展到窗口和菜单元素，超越当前菜单栏和Dock的半透明。
    *   **圆角元素：** 应用图标、窗口及其他界面元素将采用更圆润的边角。
    *   **磨砂玻璃效果：** 界面将呈现磨砂玻璃般的质感。
    *   **浮动菜单栏：** 可能引入浮动菜单栏，并增加深度，带来更光泽的视觉体验。
*   **统一性：** 简化导航、菜单和布局，以实现iOS和macOS之间更好的设计一致性。
*   **开发者支持：** 苹果将提供新的指导方针和资源，帮助开发者调整其应用以匹配更新后的美学。

![macOS Tahoe Render](https://images.macrumors.com/t/eCl0QKwfAuMcM_TcqkvAmL_eLzM=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/macOS-Tahoe-Render.jpg?lossy)
*macOS Tahoe 渲染图*

![macOS 26 visionOS Inspired Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/xNp75FeS8H4T6wTUkl_451PeV2E=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/macOS-26-visionOS-Inspired-Feature.jpg?lossy)
*macOS 26 受 visionOS 启发的功能*

![visionos files app translucency](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gA6FYHVYva_qt7a1fi_XzmOqWwc=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/visionos-files-app-translucency.jpg?lossy)
*visionOS 文件应用半透明效果*

![visionos glass](https://images.macrumors.com/t/2XDyWt-CWJNhxrHlhIOygYrTwK8=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/visionos-glass.jpg?lossy)
*visionOS 玻璃效果*

## Apple Intelligence

macOS 26将引入新的Apple Intelligence功能，但苹果可能会谨慎发布尚未完全准备好的内容。

*   **快捷指令集成：** 快捷指令应用将更新，集成Apple Intelligence模型，使用户更容易创建实用的快捷指令。
*   **Siri增强：**
    *   Siri将很快集成Gemini和ChatGPT。
    *   个性化Siri功能（WWDC 2024宣布）：包括个人上下文（追踪设备上的邮件、消息、文件、照片等）、屏幕感知能力（根据屏幕内容提供帮助）以及更深度的应用集成。这些功能是否能在WWDC 2025发布时准备就绪尚不明确。

## 游戏应用

一款新的游戏应用正在开发中，将适用于macOS、iOS、iPadOS和tvOS。

*   **内容：** 包含App Store和Apple Arcade游戏，以及游戏内成就、排行榜和编辑内容。
*   **社交：** 用户可以在应用内与其他玩家交流。
*   **Mac独有：** 在Mac上，该应用能够访问从Mac App Store之外下载的游戏。
*   **替代Game Center：** 它将取代Game Center，提供更丰富的功能。

## 其他传闻功能

*   **辅助功能：** 苹果已预览了macOS 26和iOS 26中即将推出的一些辅助功能。
*   **Wi-Fi功能：**
    *   **强制Wi-Fi门户同步：** 在酒店或机场等强制Wi-Fi网络登录一次后，信息将同步到所有设备。
*   **放大器：** 允许将iPhone连接到Mac，使用iPhone摄像头放大文本或其他需要帮助查看的内容。
*   **车辆运动提示：** 旨在帮助缓解晕车或晕机的小点也将引入Mac，通过视觉匹配运动感。

## 兼容性

macOS Tahoe可能会停止对部分旧款Mac的支持，包括：

*   2018年MacBook Pro
*   2019年iMac
*   2017年iMac Pro
*   2018年Mac mini
*   2020年基于Intel的MacBook Air

预计兼容以下Mac机型：

*   MacBook Pro (2019年及更新型号)
*   iMac (2020年及更新型号)
*   Mac Pro (2019年及更新型号)
*   Mac mini (M1及更新型号)
*   Mac Studio (所有型号)
*   MacBook Air (M1及更新型号)

## WWDC 活动详情

*   **主题演讲：** 太平洋时间6月9日（星期一）上午10:00。
*   **直播平台：** 苹果官网、YouTube和TV应用。
*   **媒体报道：** MacRumors将提供实时博客和事件报道。
items.shortSummary: WWDC 2025将发布macOS 26 Tahoe。新系统采用统一的“26”版本号，并引入受visionOS启发的重大设计更新，强调半透明和圆角元素。Apple Intelligence将集成到快捷指令和Siri中，Siri有望支持Gemini。此外，还将推出一个取代Game Center的全新跨平台游戏应用，并增加Wi-Fi同步、放大器等功能。macOS Tahoe可能不再支持部分旧款Intel Mac，但兼容2019年及更新的MacBook Pro和M1及更新的Mac mini等。主题演讲定于6月9日。
items.content:
WWDC is less than a week away, and as we ramp up to the big announcement, we're going to share details on what we know about each operating system. We're starting with the next-generation version of macOS, which Apple is apparently going to call macOS Tahoe.


Name


Since the current version of macOS is macOS 15, it would normally be followed by macOS 16, but Apple is changing its naming scheme for operating system updates starting this year.

Everything coming out in 2025 will be numbered with a "26" to reflect its release season, covering the period between September 2025 and September 2026. We're getting macOS 26, iOS 26, iPadOS 26, tvOS 26, watchOS 26, and visionOS 26. Apple could have gone with 25 because that's the year of launch, but 26 technically does make more sense because there are more months in 2026 where we'll have the 26 series of updates installed.

With the streamlined naming that Apple is implementing, there won't be a need to remember separate, confusing numbers for each operating system. It might be confusing at first for people to go from macOS 15 to macOS 26, but it should make more sense over the long haul.

macOS is special because it always gets a California landmark name along with its number, unlike other operating systems. This year, it looks like Apple is going to go with "Tahoe," a popular lake between California and Nevada. Lake Tahoe is a popular vacation destination all year long, but particularly in the winter where it is known for its ski slopes.

Tahoe will join the other California landmark names that Apple has used, including Mavericks, Yosemite, El Capitan, Sierra, High Sierra, Mojave, Catalina, Big Sur, Monterey, Ventura, Sonoma, and Sequoia.

Design Overhaul


Most of the rumors that we've heard about Apple's upcoming software have focused on ‌iOS 26‌ and the design changes that Apple has planned, but macOS 26 is going to get some of those same design updates.


The revamp might not be quite as dramatic, but Apple wants to have a more cohesive look and feel across its operating systems, hence the design overhaul and the "26" name change.

The visionOS interface

Basically, Apple is expanding some visionOS design elements to all of its software, with a focus on translucency, rounded menus and buttons, and a frosted glass-like look for the interface. On the Mac, Apple already uses translucency for some things like the menu bar and the dock, but we could perhaps see more translucency in windows and menu elements.

App icons that have a more rounded look could happen, and we could see rounder corners for windows and other interface elements. Apple could also adopt some floating menu bars, and add more depth to everything for a glossier look and feel.

The visionOS interface

Streamlined navigation, menus, and layout could bring better design consistency across iOS and macOS. Expect to see design changes at the operating system level and in Apple's apps, with Apple also providing new guidelines and assets for developers to tailor their apps to match the updated aesthetic.

Apple Intelligence


There are new Apple Intelligence features coming in macOS 26, but Apple is undoubtedly going to be more reserved about announcing anything that's not ready to go.

Apple plans to update the Shortcuts app to integrate ‌Apple Intelligence‌. Users will be able to create actions that use ‌Apple Intelligence‌ models, which should make it easier for casual users to create useful shortcuts.

Apple might give us some insight into when Siri will be able to integrate with Gemini in addition to ChatGPT, because that's a feature coming soon.

All those personalized ‌Siri‌ features that Apple announced at WWDC 2024 are going to come in ‌iOS 26‌ and macOS 26 at some point, but it's not clear if they'll be ready by WWDC. If they're not ready to go, Apple probably won't mention them, and we'll get them later in the year.

As a reminder, we're waiting on personal context that lets ‌Siri‌ keep track of emails, messages, files, photos, and more, or basically anything on your device. Apple is also adding onscreen awareness so ‌Siri‌ can help you with what's on your screen, and ‌Siri‌ will also get deeper app integration so that it can do more in and across apps.

Gaming App


There's a new game app in the works that'll be available for macOS, iOS, iPadOS, and tvOS. It'll have the games you'd normally find in the App Store and Apple Arcade titles, along with sections for in-game achievements, leaderboards, and editorial content.

You'll be able to use the app to communicate with other people, and on the Mac, it'll be able to tap into games downloaded outside of the Mac App Store. It'll replace Game Center, and will be a more feature rich app.

Other Rumored Features


Apple previewed several Accessibility features that are coming in macOS 26 and ‌iOS 26‌, plus there have been rumors of new Wi-Fi features.

  • Captive Wi-Fi Portal Syncing - When you log into a captive Wi-Fi network, like at a hotel or an airport, you'll only need to do it once and the info will sync across all of your devices.

  • Magnifier - Apple will let you connect an iPhone to your Mac to use the ‌iPhone‌'s camera for zooming in on text and other things that you might need help seeing.

  • Vehicle Motion Cues - The little dots that are meant to help you from getting carsick or airsick are also coming to the Mac. Vehicle Motion Cues is meant to match the feeling of movement with what the eyes are seeing.


Compatibility


macOS Tahoe could drop support for some older Macs, including the 2018 MacBook Pro, the 2019 iMac, the 2017 ‌iMac‌ Pro, the 2018 Mac mini, and the 2020 Intel-based MacBook Air. The update is expected to be compatible with the following Macs:

  • ‌MacBook Pro‌ (2019 and later)

  • ‌iMac‌ (2020 and later)

  • Mac Pro (2019 and later)

  • ‌Mac mini‌ (M1 and later)

  • Mac Studio (all models)

  • ‌MacBook Air‌ (‌M1‌ and later)


Read More


We have a dedicated macOS 26 Tahoe roundup that we'll be updating throughout the week.

Make sure to check back every day for more rumor roundups, and stay tuned for our all-in-one what to expect article on Friday.

WWDC Event Details


The WWDC 2025 keynote will take place on Monday, June 9 at 10:00 a.m. Pacific Time. Apple will live stream the event on its website, on YouTube, and in the TV app.


If you're not able to watch live, we'll have a live blog and coverage of the announcements here at MacRumors, plus we'll be live tweeting the event on the MacRumorsLive account.

items.title: M2 iPad Air 折扣型号现已在苹果美国翻新商店上架 (原标题: Discounted M2 iPad Air Models Now Available in Apple's U.S. Refurbished Store)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
### M2 iPad Air 翻新机型现已在美国苹果翻新商店上架

*   **发布时间与地点**
    *   2025年6月2日，苹果公司在美国的翻新商店首次上架了11英寸和13英寸的M2 iPad Air机型，提供折扣价格。
    *   这是自2024年5月发布以来，M2 iPad Air首次在美国翻新商店提供。此前，这些机型已于本月初在英国商店上架。

*   **折扣与价格**
    *   翻新M2 iPad Air机型的折扣约为苹果全新机型原价的15%。
    *   例如：
        *   11英寸128GB的M2 iPad Air售价为469美元（原价549美元）。
        *   13英寸128GB的M2 iPad Air基础款售价为639美元（原价749美元）。

*   **产品背景**
    *   M2 iPad Air是上一代产品，已被今年早些时候发布的M3 iPad Air取代，因此无法再从苹果购买全新M2机型。

*   **翻新产品质量与保修**
    *   苹果的翻新iPad配备了全新的电池、外壳和USB-C连接线。
    *   其性能与全新iPad基本相同。
    *   苹果为翻新iPad提供一年保修，购买者还可以选择延长AppleCare+服务。

*   **库存情况**
    *   目前有多种颜色、容量以及蜂窝网络和标准Wi-Fi型号可供选择。
    *   库存会随着时间波动，建议定期查看以获取特定颜色或容量的机型。

![M2 iPad Air 横向特色橙色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/XYYTeLw5TOdKXWybQ6OcPKNA1yA=/400x0/article-new/2024/05/m2-iPad-Air-Horizontal-Feature-Orange.jpg?lossy)

items.translated_title: M2 iPad Air 折扣型号现已在苹果美国翻新商店上架

images.alt: m2 iPad Air Horizontal Feature Orange

items.content:
Apple today added the 11-inch and 13-inch M2 iPad Air models to its refurbished store in the United States, offering these tablets at a discounted price in the U.S. for the first time since its May 2024 launch.


Refurbished ‌M2‌ ‌iPad Air‌ models are discounted by approximately 15 percent compared to Apple's original pricing for new models. The 11-inch ‌iPad Air‌ with 128GB of storage is $469, for example, while the base 13-inch 128GB ‌iPad Air‌ is $639. Apple originally sold the 11-inch ‌M2‌ ‌iPad Air‌ for $549, and the 13-inch model for $749.

The refurbished ‌M2‌ ‌iPad Air‌ models were added to the UK store earlier this month, but they are new to the U.S. store.

Apple replaced the ‌M2‌ ‌iPad Air‌ with the M3 ‌iPad Air‌ earlier this year, so the ‌M2‌ models are the prior-generation ‌iPad Air‌ option and can no longer be purchased new from Apple.

There are multiple colors and capacities available as of the time of writing, as well as cellular and standard Wi-Fi models, but stock will fluctuate over time as Apple refreshes what's available. If you're aiming for a particular color or capacity, you might need to check back.

Refurbished iPads from Apple are equipped with new batteries, outer shells, and a new USB-C cable, and are essentially identical in performance to new-in-box iPads. Apple offers a one-year warranty on refurbished iPads, and buyers can purchase extended AppleCare+ coverage.

items.title: iOS 18.6：作为iOS 26发布前的最终更新之一，我们能期待什么 (原标题: What to Expect From iOS 18.6 as One of the Final Updates Before iOS 26)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## iOS 18.6 预期：作为iOS 26前的最终更新

自iOS 18.5发布三周以来，苹果用户仍在等待iOS 18.6的首个测试版。根据MacRumors的访问日志，苹果的软件工程师自三月底以来一直在内部测试iOS 18.6。

![iOS 18](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ExEMnFYsrwBfKe1TJIoNPBXcy3k=/400x0/article-new/2025/03/iOS-18.6-Feature-Real-Mock.jpg?lossy)

### 发布时间预测

历史数据显示，iOS 13.6至iOS 16.6的首个测试版均在WWDC（全球开发者大会）之前发布，而iOS 17.6的首个测试版则在去年WWDC后一周发布，因此iOS 18.6测试版的具体发布时间难以精确预测。

以下是过去几个iOS .6版本的发布时间及主要内容：

*   **iOS 13.6** (2020年6月1日测试版 / 7月15日正式版)：引入钱包应用中的数字车钥匙、Apple News+音频故事、健康应用中的症状类别，并包含错误修复和小型增强。
*   **iOS 14.6** (2021年4月22日测试版 / 5月24日正式版)：支持Apple Podcasts订阅、Apple Card家庭共享、AirTag和“查找”功能增强，并包含错误修复。
*   **iOS 15.6** (2022年5月18日测试版 / 7月20日正式版)：允许在TV应用中重启直播体育赛事，并包含错误修复。
*   **iOS 16.6** (2023年5月19日测试版 / 7月24日正式版)：主要包含错误修复和安全补丁。
*   **iOS 17.6** (2024年6月17日测试版 / 7月29日正式版)：主要包含错误修复和安全补丁。

根据过往模式，iOS 18.6的正式版很可能在7月中旬发布。

### iOS 18.6 新功能与预期

彭博社的Mark Gurman预计，iOS 18.6将会在中国启用Apple Intelligence功能，并由阿里巴巴和百度为该国的部分功能提供支持。此外，iOS 18.6也可能包含错误修复和安全漏洞补丁。目前尚不清楚此次更新是否会有其他重大变化。鉴于iOS 26测试版即将发布，iOS 18.6预计将是一个次要更新。

### iOS 26 的到来

苹果预计将在下周（2025年6月9日）的WWDC 2025上宣布iOS 26，而非iOS 19，这标志着苹果将采用新的软件版本号命名方案。iOS 26的首个测试版预计将在苹果主题演讲后不久向开发者发布，而面向公众的正式版更新则可能在9月推出。
items.shortSummary: iOS 18.6作为iOS 26发布前的最终更新之一，目前仍在等待首个测试版，预计7月中旬发布正式版。主要新功能可能包括在中国启用Apple Intelligence，并由阿里巴巴和百度提供支持，同时包含错误修复和安全补丁。由于iOS 26（而非iOS 19）将于6月9日WWDC 2025上宣布，并预计9月发布，iOS 18.6很可能是一个次要更新。
items.translated_title: iOS 18.6：作为iOS 26发布前的最终更新之一，我们能期待什么
items.content:
It has been three weeks as of today since Apple released iOS 18.5, and we are still waiting for the first iOS 18.6 beta to follow.


Below, we outline everything we know about iOS 18.6 so far.

Timing


Apple's software engineers have been internally testing iOS 18.6 since late March, according to the MacRumors visitors logs.

The first betas of iOS 13.6 through iOS 16.6 were all released before WWDC over the years, while the first iOS 17.6 beta was released the week after WWDC last year, so it is hard to pinpoint exactly when the first iOS 18.6 beta will be available.






































iOS Version First Developer Beta Public Release Inclusions
iOS 13.6
June 1, 2020
July 15, 2020
- Digital car keys in Wallet app
- Apple News+ audio stories
- Symptoms category in Health app
- Bug fixes and small enhancements
iOS 14.6
April 22, 2021
May 24, 2021
- Apple Podcasts subscriptions
- Family Sharing for Apple Card
- AirTag and Find My enhancements
- Bug fixes
iOS 15.6
May 18, 2022
July 20, 2022
- Restart live sports in TV app
- Bug fixes
iOS 16.6
May 19, 2023
July 24, 2023
- Bug fixes and security patches
iOS 17.6
June 17, 2024
July 29, 2024
- Bug fixes and security patches


iOS 18.6 will likely be released by mid-July.

Apple is expected to announce iOS 26 at WWDC 2025 next week, instead of iOS 19, as part of a new software version number scheme. The first beta of iOS 26 should be seeded to developers shortly after Apple's keynote on Monday, June 9, and the update will likely be released to the general public in September.

New Features


Bloomberg's Mark Gurman expects iOS 18.6 to enable Apple Intelligence in China, with Alibaba and Baidu set to power some of the features in that country.

iOS 18.6 is also likely to include bug fixes and patch security vulnerabilities.

It is unclear if the update will have any other changes. With the iOS 26 beta just around the corner, iOS 18.6 is likely to be a minor update.

items.title: Polestar 仍计划提供 CarPlay Ultra (原标题: Polestar Still Plans to Offer CarPlay Ultra)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# Polestar 确认将提供 CarPlay Ultra

Polestar 公司发言人向 MacRumors 证实，该品牌仍致力于在未来的电动汽车中提供 CarPlay Ultra。然而，Polestar 目前尚未提供具体的上市时间或任何其他细节。

## CarPlay Ultra 的现状与普及

许多汽车制造商对采用 CarPlay Ultra 保持沉默，因此 Polestar 确认仍计划提供该软件系统这一点值得关注。目前，CarPlay Ultra 仅限于美国和加拿大的豪华品牌阿斯顿·马丁 (Aston Martin) 车辆。苹果表示，全球许多其他汽车制造商，包括现代 (Hyundai)、起亚 (Kia) 和捷尼赛思 (Genesis)，都将在未来一年及以后提供该系统。

## 历史背景与汽车制造商列表

Polestar 是苹果在 2022 年首次宣布下一代 CarPlay（现称 CarPlay Ultra）时，列出的十多家承诺提供该系统的汽车制造商之一。然而，鉴于该列表已有三年历史，一些汽车制造商可能已改变计划。例如，梅赛德斯-奔驰 (Mercedes-Benz) 曾被列入其中，但此后已决定不让苹果接管其车载软件体验。

2022 年的原始承诺汽车制造商列表如下：

*   讴歌 (Acura)
*   奥迪 (Audi)
*   福特 (Ford)

## CarPlay Ultra 的主要特性

CarPlay Ultra 于上个月推出，具有以下特点：

items.translated_title: Polestar 仍计划提供 CarPlay Ultra

images.alt: Apple CarPlay Ultra instrument cluster themes 01 1

items.content:
Polestar remains committed to offering CarPlay Ultra in its future electric vehicles, a company spokesperson told MacRumors today. However, the brand did not provide a specific timeframe for availability, or any other details at this time.


Many automakers have been tight-lipped about adopting CarPlay Ultra, so Polestar confirming that it still plans to offer the software system is notable.

CarPlay Ultra is currently limited to luxury Aston Martin vehicles in the U.S. and Canada. Apple said that many other automakers around the world are working to offer it over the next year and beyond, including Hyundai, Kia, and Genesis.


Polestar was one of more than a dozen automakers that Apple had listed as being committed to offering the next generation of CarPlay, now known as CarPlay Ultra, when it was first announced in 2022. Given the list is now three years old, however, it is possible that some automakers have shifted gears. For example, Mercedes-Benz was included in the list, but it has since decided not to let Apple take over its in-vehicle software experience.

That original list from 2022 was as follows:
  • Acura

  • Audi

  • Ford

  • Honda

  • Infiniti

  • Jaguar

  • Land Rover

  • Lincoln

  • Mercedes-Benz

  • Nissan

  • Polestar

  • Porsche

  • Renault

  • Volvo
Aston Martin was announced later.

Launched last month, CarPlay Ultra features deep integration with a vehicle's instrument cluster and systems, built-in Radio and Climate apps, widgets, and more. The interface is tailored to each vehicle model and automaker's identity, and drivers can also adjust the color scheme. To learn more, read our coverage of Apple's announcement.

items.title: 苹果为下周的主题演讲准备YouTube上的WWDC直播 (原标题: Apple Readies WWDC Stream on YouTube Ahead of Keynote Next Week)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## WWDC 2025 概述

*   **日期与时间**
    *   WWDC 2025 将于太平洋时间6月9日（星期一）上午10点以苹果主题演讲拉开帷幕。
    *   开发者大会状态报告（Platforms State of the Union）将于太平洋时间6月9日下午1点开始，提供更多关于新功能和开发者工具的细节。
    *   整个WWDC 2025 会议将从6月9日持续到6月13日。

*   **观看平台**
    *   主题演讲和开发者大会状态报告的直播页面已在YouTube上线，用户可设置提醒。
    *   同时，直播也将在苹果官网和Apple TV应用中进行。
    *   会后将提供点播回放。

## 预期软件更新与设计变化

*   **主要操作系统**
    *   苹果将发布其最新的软件更新，包括 iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS 26、tvOS 26、watchOS 26 和 visionOS 26。

*   **设计革新**
    *   所有这些操作系统都传闻将采用“光滑玻璃般”的全新设计。
    *   iOS 26、macOS 26、tvOS 26 和 watchOS 26 将引入受 visionOS 启发的半透明设计元素。

*   **命名规则变化**
    *   苹果计划将所有操作系统的版本号改为年份命名，例如，将直接发布 iOS 26 而非 iOS 19。

*   **macOS 26 名称泄露**
    *   据彭博社的Mark Gurman透露，macOS 26 的名称将是 macOS Tahoe，以加利福尼亚州的太浩湖命名。

## 硬件发布预期

*   彭博社的Mark Gurman表示，苹果目前没有准备好发布任何主要新设备，因此本次WWDC可能不会有重大的硬件发布。

## WWDC 2025 预热

*   在开发者大会前，苹果已更新其WWDC页面，将标语从“On the horizon”替换为新的“Sleek peek”，并更新了WWDC 2025的图形。
items.shortSummary: 苹果WWDC 2025开发者大会将于6月9日至13日举行，主题演讲定于太平洋时间6月9日上午10点。大会将发布iOS 26、macOS 26等最新软件更新，预计采用受visionOS启发的全新玻璃般设计，并可能将操作系统版本号改为年份命名（如iOS 26）。直播可在YouTube、苹果官网和Apple TV应用观看。彭博社报道称，本次大会预计不会有重大硬件发布，主要聚焦软件创新。
items.translated_title: 苹果为下周的主题演讲准备YouTube上的WWDC直播
items.content:
WWDC 2025 will kick off with Apple's keynote on Monday, June 9 at 10 a.m. Pacific Time, and the page where the presentation will be live streamed is now available on YouTube. On the page, you can set a reminder to be notified before the keynote begins.


Apple will announce its latest software updates, including iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26, tvOS 26, watchOS 26, and visionOS 26, which are all rumored to feature a sleek new glass-like design. There might not be any hardware announcements, however, as Bloomberg's Mark Gurman said that Apple has no major new devices ready to ship.

Apple has also readied its stream for the Platforms State of the Union, which will provide more details about the new features and tools for developers that are announced during the keynote. This video will begin on June 9 at 1 p.m. Pacific Time.


The keynote and Platforms State of the Union will also be streamed on Apple's website, and in the Apple TV app. On-demand playback will be available afterwards.

WWDC 2025 runs from June 9 through June 13. Ahead of the developer conference, Apple shared a new "Sleek peek" tagline on its website earlier today.

items.title: macOS 快速技巧：截图直接保存到剪贴板 (原标题: macOS Quick Tip: Screenshot Straight to the Clipboard)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
### macOS 截图技巧：直接保存到剪贴板

在 macOS 上，有多种方法可以进行屏幕截图。除了使用“预览”应用中的“文件”菜单选项或“实用工具”文件夹中的“截图”应用外，最简单和常用的方法是利用 Mac 内置的快捷键组合。

![截图应用](https://images.macrumors.com/t/gnUmX-XtE1KEjAQknLeS7MJ7I-o=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/screenshot-app-1.jpg?lossy)

**常用的截图快捷键：**

*   **Shift-Command-3：** 截取整个屏幕。
*   **Shift-Command-4：** 使用鼠标光标作为十字选择工具截取屏幕的一部分。
    *   在按下 Shift-Command-4 后，轻按空格键，光标会变成相机图标，用于截取特定窗口。

通常，通过这些快捷键截取的屏幕截图会直接保存到桌面。

**将截图直接保存到剪贴板：**

一个非常有用的技巧是，在上述任何截图快捷键（Shift-Command-3 或 Shift-Command-4）的基础上，**额外按下 Control 键**。这样，macOS 会将捕获的图像复制到剪贴板，而不是将其保存为文件到桌面。

**此功能的优势：**

*   **即时粘贴：** 当您希望将截图直接粘贴到可以编辑或查看图像的应用程序中时，此功能非常方便。
*   **通用剪贴板：** 您还可以利用通用剪贴板功能，将截图粘贴到其他 Apple 设备上。
*   **“预览”应用示例：** 在“预览”应用中，按下 Command-N 可以从剪贴板内容创建新文档，无需立即指定文件名，直到您准备保存时。此功能也可通过“预览”菜单栏中的“文件”➝“从剪贴板新建”访问。
items.shortSummary: macOS 提供多种截图方式，其中最常用的是快捷键。通过在标准截图快捷键（如 Shift-Command-3 或 Shift-Command-4）中额外加入 Control 键，可以将截图直接复制到剪贴板，而非保存到桌面。这使得用户能快速将截图粘贴到其他应用程序或通过通用剪贴板分享到其他 Apple 设备，极大提高了工作效率。
items.translated_title: macOS 快速技巧：截图直接保存到剪贴板
items.content:
There are several ways you can take screenshots on a Mac. Preview offers the option from its File menu. There's also a little screen capture app in the macOS Utilities folder called Screenshot. But the simplest and most common method is to use your Mac's built-in shortcut key combinations.


Taking a screenshot is as easy as hitting Shift-Command-3 to capture the whole screen, or Shift-Command-4 to capture a portion of the screen using the mouse cursor as a crosshair selection tool (a tap of the spacebar also turns it into a camera for capturing windows).

Screenshots taken using key shortcuts are typically saved on your desktop. However, if you tack the Control key onto either of these shortcuts, macOS will copy the captured image to the clipboard instead of saving it as a file on your desktop, which is useful if you want to paste it into an application that can edit or view images, or use Universal Clipboard to paste it on another Apple device.

In Preview, for example, Command-N creates a new document from the contents of the clipboard without you having to specify a filename until you're ready to save it. You can also access this function in Preview's menu bar (File ➝ New From Clipboard).
